bio:
learning before earning
earning and still learning
contributionDescription: To be honest, I really admire the the uniqueness of this project. Like you have to proof to dev that you want to support him and not just receive the token. It's really a planned project and I believe it'll be success. Dev you're really smart to I must commend.
impactDescription:
There will be imperfections in the lives of all people. The man who is so full will ask him about his imperfections with great sorrow. Imperfections do not exist only in the great saints and great men 
The most beautiful things in the world cannot be touched, cannot be seen with the eyes, they have to be felt only with the heart-love, kindness, sincerity.
pwFlaggedReason: Flagged: The application is in violation of rule 1, it contains promises of future impact and does not clearly define or present measurable past impacts. The contribution and impact description are vague and do not highlight clear contributions or impacts related to Web3/blockchain space.
